name: Statuette of a Rooster
description: Statuette of a Rooster; Unknown; Italy (?); late 5th - early 4th century B.C.; Terracotta with remains of white slip and polychromy; 5.7 cm (2 1/4 in.); 75.AD.89; Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Yale Goodkin; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Statuette of a Rooster
medium: Terracotta with remains of white slip and polychromy
